faq.title: quest1
faq.quest: What is this Data Science workshop about?
faq.ans: This workshop is designed to introduce you to the fundamentals of data science,including data analysis, machine learning, and practical applications

faq.title: quest2
faq.ans: This workshop is suitable for anyone interested in entering the field of data science,regardless of their background or prior experience.

faq.title: quest3
faq.quest: Do I need to have prior data science knowledge?
faq.ans: No, prior data science knowledge is not required. This workshop is designed for beginners and covers the basics.

faq.title: quest4
faq.ans: Yes, workshop materials and resources will be provided to participants.

faq.title: quest5
faq.ans: Yes, the workshop costs just â‚¹199.

faq.title: quest6
faq.quest: What should I do if I encounter technical issues during the workshop?
faq.ans: In case of technical difficulties, our support team will be available to assist you. Contact information will be provided during the workshop.
